Key Match Events: James Harden bounced back from a rough shooting first half to scatter 14 points in the third quarter.
The Clippers took a 74-72 lead before the fourth quarter.
Harden added eight more points in the fourth quarter, four coming in the final 1:14 in regulation.
Harden missed a potential game-winning layup as time expired.
The Phoenix Suns walked away with a 116-113 win in overtime.
Post-Match Reflections: Harden looked tired in the extra period and couldn't complete his heroics.
Harden impressed on offense, smartly using screens and switches to get his preferred matchups.
Harden showed up on the defensive end, hustling and providing help defense when needed.
This is the version of Harden the Clippers need to keep afloat while Leonard recovers from a sore knee.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at the newly-opened Intuit Dome.
The Clippers played without Kawhi Leonard.
